Package io.micronaut.views.pebble

@Configuration @Requires(property="micronaut.views.pebble.enabled",notEquals="false") @Requires(classes=io.pebbletemplates.pebble.PebbleEngine.class) package io.micronaut.views.pebble
Contains classes specific to Views rendered with Pebble.
Since:
2.2.0
Author:
Ecmel Ercan
